programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent (2015)

programme.desc: Tris and Four journey beyond the wall surrounding Chicago, and get caught up in a battle for the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The November Man (2014)

programme.title: Varsity Blues (1999)
programme.desc: A backup quarterback at a West Texas high school steps in for the injured starter and clashes with the gung ho coach.

Their fragile existence is upended by the arrival of a couple claiming ties to Mayas presumed dead husband. As secrets unravel, mother and daughter must confront the true nature of their visitors to survive.

programme.title: Ghost (1990)
programme.desc: A murdered New York banker returns to protect his girlfriend, with help from a psychic.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline (2015)
programme.desc: A beautiful young woman stops ageing after a car accident, and remains 29 for several decades. She refuses to get close to anyone in order to keep her condition a secret, but reconsiders her solitary lifestyle after falling in love with a philanthropist.

programme.title: Ezra (2023)
programme.desc: Max Bernal, a struggling stand-up comedian, faces the daunting challenge of co-parenting his autistic son, Ezra, with his ex-wife, Jenna. Living with his father, Max grapples with tough choices regarding Ezras future. Together, father and son embark on a transformative cross-country journey that bonds them in unexpected ways. What follows is a heartfelt tale of family resilience, humor, and compassion.

programme.title: Looper (2012)

programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuits downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s.

programme.title: Gladiator (2000)

programme.desc: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. As the scale of the perpetrator's plans become clear, he must bring justice to the abuse of power and corruption that plagues the metropolis.

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: After a sideshow vampire (John C. Reilly) turns a teenager into one of the undead, the kid becomes a pawn between warring supernatural factions.

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: An old gunslinger (Clint Eastwood), his ex-partner (Morgan Freeman) and a quick-draw kid go bounty hunting in a town called Big Whiskey.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Hairdresser Nicola is searching for her romantic ideal, but she's stuck in a coercive relationship with her partner Adam.

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: An American construction worker (Matt Damon), a French journalist (Cécile de France) and a London schoolboy set out on a spiritual journey after death touches their lives in different ways.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: A snake hunter (Jon Voight) commandeers a documentary crew (Jennifer Lopez, Ice Cube) in the Brazilian jungle, forcing them to battle a monster boa.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A defiant mortal (Brenton Thwaites) forms an unlikely alliance with the powerful god Horus (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) to save the world from Set (Gerard Butler), the merciless god of darkness.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: South London teenagers (John Boyega, Alex Esmail, Leeon Jones) defend their neighborhood from malevolent extraterrestrials.

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A serial murderer will slaughter a captive doctor's (Cary Elwes) wife and daughter unless the man kills a fellow prisoner.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: A detective (Donnie Wahlberg) races against time to save his son from a sadistic madman (Tobin Bell) holding a group of people captive.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: A kidnapped doctor (Bahar Soomekh) must keep dying Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) alive while a fellow victim (Angus Macfadyen) completes his own maniacal test.

programme.title: Saw IV
programme.desc: Jigsaw may be dead, but his grisly tortures continue from beyond the grave in this nightmarish sequel.

programme.title: Saw V
programme.desc: The horror of Jigsaw lives on in this fifth part in the series that finds a cop taking up the murderous mantle of the late psychopath.

programme.title: Saw VI
programme.desc: With Jigsaw still directing events from beyond the grave, Hoffman emerges as the heir to the killer's twisted legacy. But as the FBI closes in, Hoffman sets in motion a game that is designed to reveal Jigsaw's grand scheme.

programme.title: Saw: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Jigsaw's legacy is fulfilled in this seventh "Saw" film that finds the late maniac's successor targeting a supposed Jigsaw survivor.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Tatiana Suarez
programme.desc: A chronicle of the MMA fighter Tatiana Suarez as she returns to the sport after an injury forced a four-year hiatus; Suarez reflects on her journey from wrestling prodigy to professional athlete in the UFC and the legacy she leaves young women.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: After leaving her all-female island for the first time, Wonder Woman (Gal Gadot) discovers her full powers and true destiny while fighting alongside men in a war to end all wars.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing in Action III
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) returns to Vietnam and fights his way out with his wife, son (Roland Harrah III) and Amerasian orphans.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: After a sideshow vampire (John C. Reilly) turns a teenager into one of the undead, the kid becomes a pawn between warring supernatural factions.

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: An airport security agent (Jay Baruchel) must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman (Alice Eve) falls in love with him.

programme.title: A Ghost Story
programme.desc: A passionate young couple, unexpectedly separated by a shocking loss, discover an eternal connection and a love that is infinite.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a rapidly evolving form of dementia, a contract killer gets the chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: In 1988, N.W.A (O'Shea Jackson Jr., Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell) revolutionizes music and pop culture with their brutally honest depiction of life in Southern Los Angeles.

programme.title: Midsommar
programme.desc: A young American couple, their relationship foundering, travel to a fabled Swedish midsummer festival where a seemingly pastoral paradise transforms into a sinister, dread-soaked nightmare as the locals reveal their terrifying agenda.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer (Jamie Foxx) must race against time to save his kidnapped son (Octavius J. Johnson) from a crew of murderous gangsters.

programme.title: Monos
programme.desc: A terrorized American engineer is held captive by teenaged guerilla bandits in a South American jungle.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: A steelworker (Christian Bale) takes matters into his own hands when his brother (Casey Affleck) joins one of the Northeast's most-ruthless crime syndicates, then disappears.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Janet Planet
programme.desc: Enthralled by her own imagination, 11-year-old Lacy spends the long summer at home with her mother and three strangers.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: With his job at stake, a tech-savvy employee (Liam Hemsworth) has to infiltrate a competitor's company and steal trade secrets for his ruthless boss (Gary Oldman).

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) grows suspicious of her controlling husband (Joseph Fiennes) after she discovers secrets about the women in his past.

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: A man (Keegan-Michael Key) and his cousin (Jordan Peele) pose as ruthless gangsters to recover a stolen kitten.

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: In a fractured near-future America balanced on the razor's edge, a group of journalists must race through battlefields to reach the White House before D.C. falls.

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: Writer Ernest Hemingway (Clive Owen) begins a romance with fellow scribe Martha Gellhorn (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: Aspiring movie star and hustler Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of 1980s Hollywood, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of vicious gang warfare between the New Yorker Jets and the Puerto Rican Sharks, a romance develops across rival lines. 1960s update of "Romeo and Juliet", with amazing song and dance sequences.

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: A grieving mother (Sarah Wayne Callies) upsets the balance between life and death when she opens an ancient door that releases the restless spirit of her deceased son (Logan Creran).

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: With the help of his brother (Joaquin Phoenix), a Pennsylvanian (Mel Gibson) investigates the appearance of 500-foot-diameter circles in his crop fields.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: A paleontologist (Sam Neill) and a couple (William H. Macy, Tea Leoni) outrun cloned dinosaurs after their plane crashes on an island.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the nations of Earth collaborate on an immense defense program to protect the planet. When the aliens attack with unprecedented force, only the ingenuity of a few brave men and women can save the world.

programme.title: Batman Returns

programme.desc: Batgirl joins the caped crusaders (George Clooney, Chris O'Donnell) to stop Mr. Freeze (Arnold Schwarzenegger) and Poison Ivy from wreaking revenge upon the world.

programme.title: Woodshock
programme.desc: A haunted young woman spirals into confusion and chaos after she falls under the spell of a potent, reality-altering drug.

programme.desc: Absorta en su propia imaginación, Lacy, de 11 años, pasa el verano en casa con su madre y tres desconocidos.

programme.desc: Basado en una biografía; cuatro niños luchan para crecer en un ambiente pobre y muy poco convencional supervisados por sus disfuncionales y amorosos padres.

programme.desc: Frodo Bolsón es un hobbit al que su tío Bilbo hace portador del poderoso Anillo Único, capaz de otorgar un poder ilimitado al que la posea, con la finalidad de destruirlo. Sin embargo, fuerzas malignas muy poderosas quieren arrebatárselo.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Diez mil años antes de la ascensión de Paul Atreides, dos hermanas Harkonnen luchan contra las fuerzas que amenazan el futuro de la humanidad y establecen la legendaria secta que será conocida como Bene Gesserit.

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: La búsqueda de una cura para la enfermedad de Alzheimer por parte de un científico tiene resultados inesperados: un chimpancé superinteligente, lo que podría provocar el fin del dominio de los humanos sobre la Tierra.

programme.title: Music Box: Yacht Rock: A Dockumentary
programme.desc: Crónica del comienzo y la popularidad de la cultura pop rock suave de la costa oeste, personificada por artistas musicales como Christopher Cross, Michael McDonald, Kenny Loggins, Steely Dan y Toto.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: En Europa, una mujer rica regresa a su pobre ciudad natal con el fin de enjuiciar y ejecutar al hombre que la deshonró.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: Mina, una artista de 28 años, queda atrapada en un bosque irlandés junto a tres extraños, y cada noche la vigilan unas criaturas.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.sub-title: As Much as I Like Not Feeling
programme.desc: Sam lucha por encajar en el molde de su ciudad natal, lidiando con la pérdida y la aceptación, el canto es su gracia salvadora y la lleva en un viaje para descubrirse a sí misma y a una comunidad de extraños que no encajan y no se dan por vencidos.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Mucho antes de ser apuñalada y vencida por Blancanieves, la malvada reina Ravenna fue testigo de cómo su hermana Freya sufría una desgarradora traición y huía del reino. Freya vive desde entonces en un lejano palacio invernal donde prohíbe el amor.
